content:
{"name": "One Community", "alternate_name": "", "description": "One Community is working to create a sustainable program in pursuit of the goals of eliminating food insecurity in Fort Greene and Clinton Hill and improving the purchasing power of local low-income residents. The program supports participating families' budgets by providing a substantial and predictable amount of varied, nutritious, and appealing food every week.

Fresh Pantry Locations:

[The Ingersoll Fresh Pantry](https://www.foodhelpline.org/directory/resources/ckz7yydv9000204sbckg0uoo3) is run at the **Ingersoll Community Center** weekly on Saturdays from **11 AM - 1 PM**. The location is **177 Myrtle Avenue, Brooklyn, NY 11201**.

[The Farragut Pantry](https://www.foodhelpline.org/directory/resources/421) is run at the **Church of the Open Door** weekly on Saturdays from **10:30 AM – 12:30 PM**. The location is **201 Gold St, Brooklyn, NY 11201**.
", "email": "", "url": "https://www.onecommunitynyc.org/freshpantries", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "13 Greene Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Fort Greene", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11238", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.6860645, "longitude": -73.9728998}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 398-4242", "type": "voice"}]}
